titleStmt.title: [Time's] darling: or, [a love] worth liking; [...]men, abroad and at home, at bed and [...]mpany. [...]ell mee so; or, Loves tide.
titleStmt.author: H., C.

notesStmt.note: In two parts, printed side by side.
Imperfect: torn, affecting title and first column of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
